title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheldon Remains Upbeat on U.S. Economy
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheldon Remains Upbeat on U.S. Economy
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Sheldon Chief Investment Officer RDM Financial Group Discussing the markets as we approach the halfway point of 2017.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
